General.Name: Shanghai M&G Stationery Inc
General.Description: Shanghai M&G Stationery Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of writing instruments, student stationery, office stationery, and other products in China and internationally. The company offers foam tapes, binder clips, desktop calculators, display books, document wallets, glue tapes, staplers, utility knifes, super glues, tape dispensers, sticky notes and flags, staples removers, staples, scissors, office and heavy-duty punch products, calculators, pen holders, liquid glues, masking tapes, number machines, other desktop supplies, heavy duty staplers, white glues, and glue sticks; and writing and correction products. It also provides school supply products, such as other rulers, pencil sharpeners, compasses, erasers, and rulers; and art supplies, including paints, watercolor pens, other art supplies, oil pastels, modeling clay products, marker pens, colored pencils, crayons, and fine liners. In addition, the company offers lever arch files, rubber bands, whiteboards, measurement tapes, clip file folders, magazine containers, whiteboard erasers, retractable erasable gel and ball pens, various pens, correction tapes, permanent markers, highlighter pens, roller pens, pencil leads, office set products, zipper bags, button file bags, sticky flags, and tissue tapes. It sells its products under the M&G brand, as well as through e-commerce channels. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China. Shanghai M&G Stationery Inc. is a subsidiary of M&G Holding Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: Building 3, Guangming Economic Zone, Shanghai, China, 201406
